data.title: Sreelekha Mitra: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Sreelekha Mitra: Check out the list of all Sreelekha Mitra movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Sreelekha Mitra news on Times of India.
data.text:
Sreelekha Mitra ushers Bengali New Year with self-love; Gifts herself a brand new car

etimes.in / Apr 16, 2024, 15:38 (IST)

Bengali actress Sreelekha Mitra delights fans with a new car on Naboborsho, shares on Instagram. She is preparing for her first item song in 'Negative', aiming to showcase her dancing skills to impress the audience.

Sreelekha Mitra takes up a new challenge; performs an item number for an upcoming film

etimes.in / Mar 19, 2024, 20:15 (IST)

Sreelekha Mitra, a selective artist, showcased her dancing skills in the film 'Negative', impressing the audience with her performance. She also recently celebrated the success of 'Pariah' at a party.

Sreelekha Mitra: I said yes to ‘Kaala’ because of my admiration for Bejoy Nambiar

etimes.in / Sep 15, 2023, 11:48 (IST)

Sreelekha Mitra is making a return to Bollywood in Bejoy Nambiar's series "Kaala." Despite receiving offers after her initial success, Sreelekha chose projects she loved and prioritized family. She admires Nambiar's film "Shaitan" and accepted a role in "Kaala" after auditioning. In the series, she plays the protagonist's mother and shares the screen with Ajinkya Deo. Sreelekha aims to work in Mumbai but won't permanently relocate due to her pets. She's open to future projects that meet her standards and offer respect.

Actress Sreelekha Mitra falls victim to cyber scam, loses Rs 1 Lakh

etimes.in / Sep 08, 2023, 15:13 (IST)

Actress Sreelekha Mitra fell victim to a cyber scam, losing Rs one lakh just a day before her birthday. A caller convinced her to download an app during her illness, resulting in a financial setback. Sreelekha shared her ordeal on social media, urging caution. She reported the scam to the police and cyber cell, but the chances of recovering her money remain uncertain. Despite this setback, Sreelekha continues her acting career, recently completing a film and expressing aspirations to direct, pending the search for a suitable producer.

Actor Sreelekha Mitra loses Rs 1 lakh in online power bill fraud in Kolkata

TNN / Sep 07, 2023, 07:00 (IST)

Tollywood actor Sreelekha Mitra claimed on social media that she had lost about Rs 1 lakh to an online electricty bill fraud. The actor was reportedly tricked into downloading an app, with the help of which the scamsters siphoned off the money.

Ishaa Saha disables comments section on Instagram to counter trolls

etimes.in / Jul 19, 2023, 12:49 (IST)

With her messy hair, a stylish aviator, and a plunging neckline dress, Ishaa Saha looked nothing short of a diva but little did she know that these pics will draw so much negativity.

Angana Roy: Thanks to the entire ‘Pariah’ family for all the love, laughter, and life lessons

etimes.in / May 23, 2023, 14:47 (IST)

Angana Roy who plays one of the leads in Tathagata Mukherjee’s upcoming film ‘Pariah’ is left emotional after wrapping up the shooting. She has also thanked the entire team for all the love, laughter, and life lessons.

Paoli Dam: After ‘Kalbela’, my skin colour became a boon from being a disadvantage

etimes.in / Mar 08, 2023, 10:52 (IST)

Two powerhouse actors from Tollywood Paoli Dam and Sreelekha Mitra speaks on the struggles, countering body shaming and how they always lived their lives on their own terms.

This throwback photo featuring Indrani Halder, Sreelekha Mitra, June Maliah, Chaiti Ghoshal and other artists will make you nostalgic

etimes.in / Mar 01, 2023, 15:36 (IST)

Actress Chaiti Ghoshal shared some nostalgic photos with Sreelekha Mitra and Debleena Dutt which not only took them on a nostalgic journey but also took the fans back to good old days

Angana Roy: Looking forward to ‘Pariah’ shoot, this will be an emotionally-drenched journey

etimes.in / Feb 22, 2023, 13:13 (IST)

Actor Angana Roy will be seen opposite Vikram Chatterjee in Tathagata Mukherjee’s upcoming film ‘Pariah’ which also has Sreelekha Mitra in a key role. The shooting of the film is expected to start in mid-April. Angana was recently seen in the Raima Sen starrer web series ‘Roktokorobi’.

Valentine’s Day special Sreelekha Mitra: I’m happy with ‘my religion my love’, don’t regret anything – Exclusive

etimes.in / Feb 14, 2023, 08:00 (IST)

Sreelekha Mitra shares her thoughts on Valentine's Day, as she insists love should be celebrated every day. She also advises against mudslinging after a break-up. The seasoned actor is quite popular with her social media hashtag 'my religion my love'.

Tollywood join hands for a unique pet calendar

etimes.in / Dec 09, 2022, 19:12 (IST)

Acclaimed screenwriter and director Paramita Munsi has come with a unique concept and it received all the appreciation it needed from Tollywood. A pet calendar is being launched to showcase the bond between humans and pets in every nook and corner of this unique magazine. Paramita and his husband Sudip Bhattacharyanhave worked on this idea of the pet calendar as a tribute to the loving memories of their beloved pet Newton.

Aneek: People in Bengali industry encourage the struggle more than the excelling part

etimes.in / Nov 24, 2022, 13:55 (IST)

Kolkata filmmaker Aneek Chaudhuri prefers to see cinema as a pure art from and he would never stop experimenting with the art form. The independent filmmaker whose last film ‘The tale of a Santa and his Moth’ impressed film critics worldwide now wants to shift his base from Bengal to Kochi and he feels it is never too late to realise if you are in the wrong place at the wrong time.

Actress Aindrila Sharma still on ventilator as her condition remains critical

etimes.in / Nov 04, 2022, 13:05 (IST)

Bengali actress Aindrila Sharma, who was admitted to the hospital after suffering a stroke, is still in critical condition. According to the hospital sources, the actress is still on controlled ventilatory support in the Neuro ICU.

Parno Mittra joins Sreelekha Mitra for her next directorial

etimes.in / Sep 19, 2022, 11:32 (IST)

Sreelekha Mitra’s previous two directorial works ‘Bitter Half’ and ‘Ebong Chhad’, Sreelekha Mitra is ready for her next ‘Baranda’ which will see Parno Mittra in the lead. All these three are short films and the actor-director plans to make an anthology combining four short stories. The anthology film will then be released in theatres.
